EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM What's new in Spring Data.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: What's new in Spring Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar What's new in Spring Data on Tuesday, January 26, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, January 26, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1120727/12B8846ADEA527FC84919665EF9D1EE9]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
